00066     void test_copy_constructor1(){
00067       My::Deque<int> x(5, 6);
00068       My::Deque<int> y(x); 
00069       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y == x);
00070       y.pop_back();
00071       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y.size() == 4);
00072       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(x.size() == 5);
00073       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y != x);
00074     }
00075     void test_copy_constructor2(){
00076       My::Deque<int> x(10, 6);
00077       My::Deque<int> y(x); 
00078       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y == x);
00079       y[4] = 2;
00080       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y.size() == 10);
00081       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(x.size() == 10);
00082       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(y < x);
00083       x = y;
00084       CPPUNIT_ASSERT(x == y);
00085     }

00320      void test_insert1(){
00321         using namespace My;
00322         Deque<int> a(10,2);
00323         Deque<int>::iterator it = a.begin();
00324         it += 3;
00325         a.insert(it, 9);
00326         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a[3]==9);
00327         it = a.end() - 1;
00328         a.insert(it, 100);
00329         it = a.begin();
00330         while( it != a.end() ){
00331         ++it;
00332         }
00333      }

00353      void test_erase1(){
00354         using namespace My;
00355         Deque<int> a(7,3);
00356         Deque<int>::iterator it = a.begin();
00357         a[3] = 100;
00358         it += 3;
00359         a.erase(it);
00360         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*it==3);
00361         it = a.begin();
00362         while( it != a.end() ){
00363         ++it;
00364         }
00365     }
00366 
00367 //erase front and back
00368      void test_erase2(){
00369         using namespace My;
00370         Deque<int> a(7,3);
00371         Deque<int>::iterator it = a.begin();
00372         a[0] = 100;
00373         a[6] = 1000;
00374         a.erase(it);
00375         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*(a.begin())!=100);
00376         it= (a.end()-1);
00377         a.erase(it);
00378         it = a.begin();
00379         while( it != a.end() ){
00380         ++it;
00381         }
00382         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*(a.end()-1)!=1000);
00383     }

00578                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!d.empty());

00618         void test_deque_equal1 () {
00619                 using namespace My;

00621                 const Deque<int> b(3, 123);
00622                 const Deque<int> c(3, 456);
00623                 
00624                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a == b);
00625                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!(a == c));
00626                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!(b == c));

00678         void test_deque_erase1 () {
00679                 using namespace My;
00680                 Deque<int> a(3,123);
00681                 a.erase(a.begin()+1);
00682                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 2);
00683                 Deque<int> b(4,456);
00684                 b.erase(b.begin());
00685                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b.size() == 3);
00686         }
00687 
00688         void test_deque_erase2 () {
00689                 using namespace My;
00690                 Deque<char> a(3,'a');
00691                 a.erase(a.begin()+1);
00692                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 2);
00693                 Deque<char> b(4,'x');
00694                 b.erase(b.begin());
00695                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b.size() == 3);
00696         }
00697 
00698         // --------
00699         // pop_back

00703                 using namespace My;
00704                 Deque<int> a(3,123);
00705                 a.pop_back();
00706                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 2);
00707         }
00708         void test_deque_pop_back2 () {
00709                 using namespace My;
00710                 Deque<char> a(3,'a');
00711                 a.pop_back();
00712                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 2);
00713         }

00735         // ----------
00736         
00737         void test_deque_push_front1 () {
00738                 using namespace My;
00739                 Deque<int> a(3,123);
00740                 a.push_front(456);
00741                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 4);
00742                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.at(0) == 456);
00743         }
00744         
00745         void test_deque_push_front2 () {
00746                 using namespace My;
00747                 Deque<char> a(3,'a');
00748                 a.push_front('b');
00749                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 4);
00750                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.at(0) == 'b');
00751         }
00752

00757         void test_deque_push_back1 () {
00758                 using namespace My;
00759                 Deque<int> a(3,123);
00760                 a.push_back(456);
00761                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.size() == 4);
00762                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(a.at(3) == 456);
00763         }
